ygData.subject: Gone Mad
ygData.msgSnippet: As I might have told you before, I don t have everquest, I hope I ll get it for X-mas, which is like, 92 DAYS AWAY!!!! And I am so restless and I spend alot of
ygData.messageBody:
As I might have told you before, I don't have
everquest, I hope I'll get it for X-mas, which is like, 92
DAYS AWAY!!!! And I am so restless and I spend alot of
time on either reading everquest faq, surfing eq
sites, or chatting on graphics chat, nothing on my
computer is any longer entertaining--well, maybe
sometimes-- but all I have is Grim Fandango, Oddworld, Monkey
Island, and some other stuff, which I bearly ever do,
since I've had MI for a while and I've beaten Grim
Fandango, I mainly surf the net now or program my simple
web-pages And/or computer games on VB, I would probally
spend hours looking at all the pictures in the eq site,
this club, and dromaster's eq club, I need something
new to do while I'm waiting 92 days.<br><br>Thanks, I
just had to say that,<br>for something to
do.<br><br>--Destino88
